name: Beeperoid
description:
You like beeps? You like boops? This game's got all of them.

Beeperoid is an idle clicker game in space. Fly around and spam click your way to music nirvana. Upgrade your tech to more efficiently harvest the environment around you, building up a jamming tune on the way.

- Collect samples to unlock upgrades and layers of the music

- Explore and find the easter eggs

There is currently no end to the game

Please purchase the game through the Locally Sourced Spring Bundle instead! It was made for this bundle and has a lot of other _really_ cool games.
